Description.Text: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 88 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area and a business centre. Wireless internet access in public areas allows guests to stay connected. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. The rooms have a double bed and a sofa bed. Separate bedrooms are optionally bookable. A fridge, a cooker, a microwave, a tea/coffee station and a dishwasher ensure a comfortable stay. Internet access, a TV, a games console and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool and an indoor pool are available to travellers. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. The accommodation offers a gym (for a fee) to guests. Meals Bed and breakfast is bookable. It is also possible to order breakfast.
